name: Wrapped AI
description:
Your consciousness has been trapped in a microchip and wrapped with a thick layer of bubble wrap! You will need the help of your robot friend to finish all the levels to regain your human form.

Unfortunately, your friend is a poorly programmed AI and can only perform a fixed set of tasks, you will need to help it by pressing the action buttons to tell it what to do.

Wrapped AI is a physics-based puzzle-platformer about collaborating with a robot controlled by an AI to finish the stages.

Help your robot friend by pressing the action buttons to tell it if it should jump when it reaches an edge or if it should kick the bubble wrap ball.

The game can be controlled with only a mouse, no keyboard required! The only exception is the pause button, which is Escape.

Created for the WOWIE Jam 4.0

Source code: https://github.com/HexagonNico/Project-Wowie4

Support the author: https://ko-fi.com/hexagonnico
